item.title: Seymour Hersh Issues Grave Warning in Venice: “Trump Wants to Be Commander of America — He Wants to Not Have Another Election”
item.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist spoke candidly about America’s “existential crisis” at a Venice press conference for ‘Cover-Up’: “This a bad time for America, because of that man’s megalomania.”
